origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'OptimizationAPI.suggest_improvements', 'description': 'This function provides detailed suggestions for cost optimization based on the analysis report and available budget.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'analysis_report', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The report generated from the cost analysis.'}, {'name': 'budget', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The available budget for implementing the optimizations.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'optimization_plan', 'description': 'The detailed plan for cost optimization including implementation steps.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 OptimizationAPI.suggest_improvements, 它的参数输入如下: 'analysis_report'是'generated_report', 'budget'是'100000'.
